data.name: The Defector Anthology
data.detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the https://support.steampowered.com/kb_article.php?ref=8699-OASD-1871">Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


The Defector Asset Pack

THE ART OF THE DEFECTOR + THE SCREENPLAY

A digital artwork book containing the concept art, designs from world class concept artist JEREMY LOVE (Marvel, Lion Witch and the Wardrobe, Star Wars, Alien)


Includes:
  • TheArtofTheDefector.pdf - 20 MB
  • TheDefectorScreenplay.pdf - 1MB

PRODUCTION ASSETS (OUT NOW!)

Documentation and assets from the DIRECTING, WRITING, and PRODUCTION of a world class quality film. Budgets, Briefs, Plans, templates, Mood books and much more.


Includes:
  • PRODUCTIONASSETS
Budgets, pitches, documents, previs, briefs, directors prep, and much more from inside the production process.

THE DEFECTOR ANTHOLOGY FILM SCAN BLUERAY QUALITY (OUT NOW!)

A beautiful film scan of anthology’s film print in blueray quality.


Includes:
  • THEDEFECTORFILMSCAN.mp4
  • 640 kbps AAC Audio
  • 1920x1080
  • h.264 40mbit/sec (approximately Blu-Ray quality)


MORE TO COME - The ASSET PACK will grow over time as we are still in production.


#label_about_the_series

The Cold War's greatest unsolved mystery: in 1967 Prime Minister Holt disappeared without a trace. His body was never found. Experience his last days in office and discover the truth behind what really happened in this tense genre bending conspiracy thriller, part one of an anthology series of high-end movies, on Steam.

Holt's story continues in CHAPTER 3 (coming soon) Support us making more content by buying the ASSET PACK: The Art of The Defector, (A digital artwork book containing the concept art, designs from world class concept artist Jeremy Love (MARVEL, Lion Witch and the Wardrobe, STAR WARS, ALIEN) the production asset pack, and much more.

data.short_description: The Cold War's greatest unsolved mystery: in 1967 Prime Minister Holt disappeared without a trace. His body was never found. Experience his last days in office and discover the truth behind what really happened in this tense genre bending conspiracy thriller, part one of an anthology series of high-end movies, free on Steam.
data.reviews:
“"A dark Gem. Exquisite design and snarling execution."”
100 – Polygon

“"Taltilizing. Takes it to a whole new level."”
100 – Gizmodo

“"Top notch... awesomely intriguing"”
100 – Geek Tyrant

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.

  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
